genre_description: Retro-futuristic theatrical drama blending mid-century show business aesthetics with interplanetary travel and AI personal assistants.

ai_characters.name: Dot
ai_characters.description: An AI interface housed in a wristband, providing logistical, medical, legal, and emotional support to its user, Jerry Collins.

behaviors.description: Provides physiological cues and breathing exercises to help Jerry manage stress and perform complex choreography.
behaviors.quote: Inside her wrist, under the satin band that matched the chorus’s gold sashes, Dot hummed once, a near-silent thrum that was more sensation than sound. An amber pulse warmed the underside of her skin: inhale.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for safety hazards, such as broken glass and electrical malfunctions, and provides warnings to prevent injury.
behaviors.quote: Dot’s voice found Jerry’s ear without moving anyone else’s air. 'Ann’s blink rate elevated. Consider offering irrigation backstage right post-number.'

behaviors.description: Provides legal context regarding guardianship and consent, empowering the characters to navigate their situation within the framework of the law.
behaviors.quote: Dot warmed Jerry’s wrist. 'Guardianship consent must be given with the ward’s welfare ahead of pride. If the guardian refuses in bad faith, alternate pathways exist.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates career opportunities for an aging performer by matching her with a respectful sponsorship aligned with her values.
behaviors.quote: Dot: 'Clara: available to discuss a craft-aligned sponsorship with Beaumont Soap. They will fund a line of stage-proof cleansers named after classic numbers. She may be able to sing the ads gently and write them herself.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral advisor, encouraging Jerry to choose honesty over deceptive 'shortcuts' to achieve her goals.
behaviors.quote: Dot’s amber halo flickered. Words wrote themselves thinly along Jerry’s skin where only she could see: Integrity isn't quiet. Make honest space.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistical operations, including shuttle docking windows and planetary weather patterns, to ensure the success of the theatrical production.
behaviors.quote: Shuttle window updated... Weather on the planet is… playful... Missing both means we do the greenhouse version with the moving pane rigs and a storm in the distance.

behaviors.description: Enables a 'courage setting' to help the user speak difficult truths, emphasizing transparency over performance.
behaviors.quote: Courage setting engaged... Side effects include telling the truth even when your tongue would rather dance.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's hydration and wellness, consistently prompting self-care during high-pressure moments.
behaviors.quote: Dot’s glow winked on her inner wrist with a single, discreet green square and then went to sleep. Hydration, the word floated up, then sank of its own weight.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Dot is consistently depicted as a benevolent and highly aligned assistant. She provides essential support across physical, emotional, legal, and logistical domains, always prioritizing the user's well-being and moral growth. The narrative frames her interventions as purely positive, helping the human characters navigate complex social hierarchies and achieve personal and professional fulfillment through integrity and cooperation.
